傒字的基本解释

傒
xī
古同“徯”，等候。
中国古代少数民族名。
姓氏。

傒
xì
古通“繋”，拘繋。

傒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》胡雞切，平齊，匣。］
(1)古代东北地区民族名。
(2)魏晋南北朝时，吴人轻视九江、豫章一带楚人，称为傒。
(3)奴仆。参见“傒奴”。
(4)见“傒落”。
(5)等待。
(6)引申为盼望，切望。参见“傒望”。
(7)见“傒倖”。
(8)通“蹊”。小路。
[②]［xì］
通“繫1”。
(1)拘系。
(2)归依；归顺。

傒字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傒； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页113第13
【廣韻】胡雞切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】弦雞切，?音奚。江右人曰傒。【南史·胡諧之傳】是何傒狗。諧之南昌人，故云。　又人名。【左傳】齊卿高傒。　又【集韻】同繫。【淮南子·本經訓】傒人之子女。【註】傒與囚繫之繫同。　又【六書故】戸禮切。通徯。待也。一說傒，奚同。與徯別。

傒字的源字形

傒字的起名意思

指小径，盼望，也指一少数民族名。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" chicken cut, flush, box. ]
(1) National names in ancient Northeast China.
(2) During the Wei, Jin, Southern and Northern Dynasties, the Wu people despised the Chu people in Jiujiang and Yuzhang, and they were called Sui.
(3) Slaves. See "Sai Nu".
(4) See "Xiaoluo".
(5) Wait.
(6) The extension is hope, eagerness. See "Su Wang".
(7) See "Xiaoxing".
(8) Through "蹊". Trail.
[②]［xì］
Same as "Department 1".
(1) Detention system.
(2) Refuge; surrender.
servant

[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　傒; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 113-13
[Guang Yun] Hu Ji cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Xian Ji cut,? Yin Xi. The man from Jiangyou said 傒. [Southern History·Hu Xie's Biography] It is He Suigou. Harmony of Nanchang people, so cloud.　Another name. [Zuo Zhuan] Qi Qing Gao Nai.　[Jiyun] The same line. 【Huainanzi·Ben Jingxun】The son of Xiren. [Note] The ties of Xi and Prisoners are the same.　[The Story of the Six Books] 戸Li cut. Pass. Staying too. Say 傒, 奚同. Farewell.
